model_answer: The answer is A, C, D. The on-screen search for music on Artlist (typing “Artlist.io”) and the prompt “Looking for the best music for your videos?” motivated the concept that the “search is over” (Option A). The announcement of the license covering everything established the theme and sonic vibe (Option B). The narrator explained that the commercial uses an original song by the performing musicians and features the hook “It’s all for you” (Option C). Additionally, the color palette exploration using yellows with blue/green contrasts drew from classic art and modern design mood boards (Option D).
